name: Aura Break
summary: Reverses the effects of Fairy Aura and Dark Aura. This means that Fairy and Dark moves will have its power decreased by 33% if the Pokémon has Fairy Aura or Dark Aura, respectively.
viability: This is a pretty bad ability for Zygarde. Xerneas is an incredibly powerful Pokémon, so Moonblast will still do a lot even with Aura Break on the field. To make matters worse, this ability only affects Xerneas and Yveltal. It does nothing to help out Zygarde, really.
